job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Creating and maintaining assets and components with java, Mendix and other technologies to leverage usage and/or integrate with external (cloud) platforms.
     * Closely collaborating with customers and partners to create innovative products that bring cloud-and external platform capabilities into Mendix web applications.
     * Working on an Enterprise App development platform and we're in it for the long haul. Thousands of developers and millions of end users across the globe rely on your work and each commit can make a lot of impact.
     * Diving into all sorts of technologies to integrate our platform with external systems. While our current focus is on Mendix with Java, we also utilize REST APIs, Python, and cloud technologies, and are open to adopting any new technology necessary to achieve our goals.
job_details.full_text:
Lead Developer

* Creating and maintaining assets and components with java, Mendix and other technologies to leverage usage and/or integrate with external (cloud) platforms.
     * Closely collaborating with customers and partners to create innovative products that bring cloud-and external platform capabilities into Mendix web applications.
     * Working on an Enterprise App development platform and we're in it for the long haul. Thousands of developers and millions of end users across the globe rely on your work and each commit can make a lot of impact.
     * Diving into all sorts of technologies to integrate our platform with external systems. While our current focus is on Mendix with Java, we also utilize REST APIs, Python, and cloud technologies, and are open to adopting any new technology necessary to achieve our goals.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional software development using Java and Mendix, with some integration of external systems via REST APIs and Python. It does not involve the core responsibilities or technologies associated with ML Engineering or GenAI Engineering, such as model development, training, fine-tuning, or advanced generative AI techniques. The role is primarily about building and integrating enterprise applications, which falls outside the scope of AI-specific engineering roles as defined in the coding book.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Creating and maintaining assets and components with java, Mendix and other technologies' and 'Enterprise App development platform', which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Creating and maintaining assets and components with java, Mendix and other technologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'integrate our platform with external systems' and 'REST APIs' points to software integration tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: integrate our platform with external systems

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Closely collaborating with customers and partners to create innovative products' indicates a need to understand business needs and collaborate with stakeholders.
job_tasks.phrase: Closely collaborating with customers and partners to create innovative products

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'thousands of developers and millions of end users' and 'your work and each commit can make a lot of impact' implies building scalable and impactful software applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Thousands of developers and millions of end users across the globe rely on your work and each commit can make a lot of impact.

soft_skills.phrase: Closely collaborating with customers and partners
each commit can make a lot of impact
